project.name: OpenIDM
project.description: OpenIDM is an open standards based Identity Management, Provisioning and Compliance solution. Experience shows that the most important features of an identity management product are: high flexibility in Business Process handling and compliance with open standards and interfaces. A highly flexible user interface combined with a very robust workflow engine make OpenIDM ready for any Identity Management project.
